body: Normies commenting on gts shit is always the funniest shit
i like giantess stuff but i wish they were gentle. why do they have to be literally h*tler killing people
another one of those shit doujins with giantesses killing humans
I love giantess stuff but it’s almost always a turn-off when the guy is microscopic. It’s just a bit too weird, and I love soryuu’s stuff. Especially the giantess bandits one.
what a waste of talent. even though the artstyle is really good, the giantess and miniguy story is really shit.
I'd rather die by myself than being those 2 girls plaything!
acyui000511 we just want to express our feelings for this messed up work,like he was killed and she fucking moaned??????????
Bro if u dont like it u dont need to waste ur time to shxt in comments. U just off this page & go find next u like. Ur shxtty  coms wont make u look cool or something.

why do I feel like this is a western artist's work?
Japanese work should not be like this. they usually is more engaging and more direct toward its approach. meanwhile western comics tends to use non-important terms and elaborate it while having no relation to the "giantess" aspect of the work. Like the origin of shrinking medicine, like the subject's life situation before shrinking, etc. Like we readers care about that. We only care the interraction between the shrinking person and the giantess that's all.

soryuu is a Japanese artist right?
Nope... just nope, not my thing. Just looking at these bitches doing stupid shit and... nope I'm out, bye.
